note.p: German apothecary and botanist. Court apothecary in Cologne, 1821–52. Author of Index alphabeticus specierum hymenomycetum in epicrisi systematis mycologici Friesii: descriptarum earumque synonymarum (1852).
Index collectorum: herbarii senckenbergiani (http://www.senckenberg.de/files/content/forschung/abteilung/botanik/index_collectorum.pdf, accessed 6 December 2016)
